org.lafayette.server.resources
Class BaseResource

java.lang.Object
  org.lafayette.server.resources.BaseResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.sun.jersey.api.model.AbstractResourceModelListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
IndexResource, ServiceResource, UserResource
abstract class BaseResource
extends Object
implements com.sun.jersey.api.model.AbstractResourceModelListener

Common functionality for all resource classes. TODO Write tests for this class.

Author:
Sven Strittmatter
